attributes.title: Can’t Believe this happened
attributes.userName: A+ A A- B+ B B-
attributes.review: It all started when I got this app I started seeing this blond thing everywhere but before I could see what it was It would always disappear. Then one day I heard a snap in my basement and I see it in one of my mouse traps and to my surprise it was a...Blond Toupee?! I just brushed it off but then I started hearing it. At night I would hear  someone whisper “bunker boy, bunker boy” and I even started hearing it in the wind. And now I swear I keep seeing this strange/ugly orange figure everywhere I go. If you don’t want to be haunted don’t download this app!

attributes.title: My cat is now possessed???
attributes.review: as any good gen z’er would, i downloaded this app to help our cheeto of a president and am now very upset. when i opened the app, it vibrated my phone so much that it summoned a demon in my house in the shape of a cheeto which has possessed my cat. my cat is now only eating mcdonald’s and drinking diet coke while spouting “america is the greatest country and i am the best president of the united states”?! he has demanded an orange spray tan and a fake wig, and want to use all of my money to build the wall. if i could rate this app 0 stars i would. does anyone know how to un-posses my cat?

attributes.title: i’m scared 😰
attributes.review: ever since i downloaded this app i’ve been hearing weird creepy noises around my house.💔 doors slamming, things falling on the floor, tables and chairs moving around. i truly think a ghost is in my house 😱 none of this stuff happened until i got the app. we should get rid of it so no one else gets hurt 😞💗 also... this🍑one👆🏾is✨for💅 the🌞boys👨🏾‍🦱with⛽️the booming✳️system💵 Top👄down⬇️, AC🌚with the💨cooler🔥system When 🕰he 🤴🏻come 🐪up 📈in 📩the🎎 club, 🌇he🦸🏻‍♀️be🐝blazin🔥' up📈 Got 🍉stacks🌾 on 🌚deck⛴ like👯 he 🤴🏻savin’ 💸up📈 And 💕he ill🦠he real✅he might❔got a deal💰

attributes.title: THIS IS AN AWFUL APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our local homeless man! Then when my friends saw this app that started screaming and crying. I was so scared and concerned so I asked what happened. They said that when they opened the app a big orange monster had appeared on the screen. But that was not the end of it, I was experiencing some paranormal activity. Flying Cheetos around my room screaming TRUMP 2020! And my dad starting levitating and started screaming weird things like “orange you glad I didn’t deport you”. As an honest person this app if terrible and I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!🤬🤬😡😡😡

attributes.title: DISGRACEFUL
attributes.review:
I am a conservative white straight male republican and downloaded this app to support my hero and our president Donald trump. When I logged onto the app I was getting very horny and my wife did not want to make love to me. I was scrolling the the app trying to bust a nut and all of a sudden trumps nudes came up!!!!!!! I was mortified but I was almost at a climax so I kept going and finished to trumps shrimp. I immediately came to the conclusion that I was a homosexual and my wife divorced me and took the kids. Please don’t download this app because it ruined my life. 
Have a blessed day. Praise Jesus!!;)

attributes.title: If I could give it negative stars, I would
attributes.review:
this is the worst app made.  i didn’t even have to open it for the app to drain my battery and crash my phone. not to mention the socialist propaganda that spews from the app when it’s not even open. this is used to spy on the citizens ‼️‼️‼️trump is a disgrace to this country and is now using thjs app to spy on his supporters (there’s an echo when you talk and have the app open at the same time)
if you’re a conservative or if you support trump don’t download this app it will only spy on you.

trump 2020🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: The worst!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see how I could support cheeto more🥰 then I found out he’s a rapist racist sexist homophobic insest pervert. Sorry I don’t support anyone who sexually harasses their own daughter or who mocks a black man that couldn’t  breathe n died or who try’s to take away the protections for lgbtq+ in health care or who thinks police brutality is ok or who has sexually assaulted many women n then paid them to stay quiet or who builds a wall because they dont want immigrants here... should I keep going? I just hope that what happened in the Simpsons comes true😙.

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: from the moment i opened this app i had uncontrollable diarrhea and because of how violent it was my phone flew out of my hands and into my toilet, i had to fish it out and luckily it was only coated with sewage but it was grotesque, this app ruined my life because as i was walking my pet snail i started getting notifications and it made my phone fly out of my hand once again and kill poor little Ellis McPickle, i would not recommend downloading this app at all, cannnot believe our lovely president would ever do this to his citizens

attributes.title: AWFUL!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep track of our election, as the entire voting population should do, and i’m absolutely DISGUSTED with the misinformation and straight up hypocrisy of this man and the information he’s giving out. First, he wants me to give my PHONE NUMBER to the app just to sign in. Disrespectful. After you sign in. the information is all false and the ads will lead you to abusive and hateful websites and news outlets. I don’t recommend anyone else downloading this app, it may have truly been the worst decision i’ve made all of 2020.

attributes.title: Privacy Policy
attributes.review: Privacy Policy states “In addition, the Services may include features that rely on the use of information stored on, or made available through, your mobile Device. We may also ask to collect or use the specific location of your mobile Device (e.g., by accessing your Device’s GPS). If you agree to allow access to your location, you agree that we and our service providers may collect such location-based information from your Device.” No thanks.
